name: The Gentlemans Guide To Cockfighting (2D)
description:
Welcome to The Gentlemens Guide to Cockfighting!

Ever wanted to participate in the horrific bloodsport of cockfighting? Well now you can! You play the role of a sir - turned - cock manager, as you work to turn around your deceased uncle's game cock farm, and fight to win the Ultimate Cockfighting Championship!

This is a manager style game, you release your fighting rooster into the ring and "ENHANCE" their performance by injecting them with a variety of drugs!

Each drug has different effects, strategize when to use which kind to turn the odds of battle into your favor! Upgrade your inherited cockfarm, and be the ultimate cockfighting master!
